016package io.micronaut.maven;
017
018import com.github.dockerjava.api.command.BuildImageCmd;
019import com.google.cloud.tools.jib.plugins.common.PropertyNames;
020import io.micronaut.maven.jib.JibMicronautExtension;
021import io.micronaut.maven.services.ApplicationConfigurationService;
022import io.micronaut.maven.services.DockerService;
023import io.micronaut.maven.jib.JibConfigurationService;
024import org.apache.maven.execution.MavenSession;
025import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecution;
026import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
027import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.Mojo;
028import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.ResolutionScope;
029import org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject;
030
031import javax.inject.Inject;
032import java.io.File;
033import java.io.IOException;
034import java.nio.file.Files;
035import java.nio.file.LinkOption;
036import java.nio.file.StandardCopyOption;
037
038/**
039 * <p>Allows using a provided Dockerfile.</p>
040 * <p><strong>WARNING</strong>: this goal is not intended to be executed directly. Instead, specify the packaging type
041 * using the <code>packaging</code> property, eg:</p>
042 *
043 * <pre>mvn package -Dpackaging=docker</pre>
044 *
045 * @author Álvaro Sánchez-Mariscal
046 * @since 1.1
047 */
048@Mojo(name = DockerMojo.DOCKER_PACKAGING, requiresDependencyResolution = ResolutionScope.COMPILE_PLUS_RUNTIME)
049public class DockerMojo extends AbstractDockerMojo {
050
051    public static final String DOCKER_PACKAGING = "docker";
052
053    @SuppressWarnings("CdiInjectionPointsInspection")
054    @Inject
055    public DockerMojo(MavenProject mavenProject, JibConfigurationService jibConfigurationService,
056                      ApplicationConfigurationService applicationConfigurationService, DockerService dockerService,
057                      MavenSession mavenSession, MojoExecution mojoExecution) {
058        super(mavenProject, jibConfigurationService, applicationConfigurationService, dockerService, mavenSession,
059                mojoExecution);
060    }
061
062    @Override
063    public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
064        File dockerfile = new File(mavenProject.getBasedir(), DockerfileMojo.DOCKERFILE);
065        if (dockerfile.exists()) {
066            try {
067                getLog().info("Using provided Dockerfile: " + dockerfile.getAbsolutePath());
068                mavenProject.getProperties().put(PropertyNames.SKIP, "true");
069
070                copyDependencies();
071
072                String targetDir = mavenProject.getBuild().getDirectory();
073                File targetDockerfile = new File(targetDir, dockerfile.getName());
074                Files.copy(dockerfile.toPath(), targetDockerfile.toPath(), LinkOption.NOFOLLOW_LINKS,
075                        StandardCopyOption.REPLACE_EXISTING);
076
077                BuildImageCmd buildImageCmd = dockerService.buildImageCmd()
078                        .withDockerfile(targetDockerfile)
079                        .withTags(getTags())
080                        .withBaseDirectory(new File(targetDir));
081                getNetworkMode().ifPresent(buildImageCmd::withNetworkMode);
082                dockerService.buildImage(buildImageCmd);
083            } catch (IOException e) {
084                throw new MojoExecutionException(e.getMessage(), e);
085            }
086        } else if (jibConfigurationService.getFromImage().isEmpty()) {
087            mavenProject.getProperties().setProperty(PropertyNames.FROM_IMAGE, JibMicronautExtension.DEFAULT_BASE_IMAGE);
088        }
089    }
090
091}
